p: Nerol (( Z)-3,7-dimethyl-2,6-octadien-1-ol) ( Figure 8) is a natural monoterpene cis-isomer of geraniol and the major component of essential oils from spices such as neroli ( Citrus aurantium), rose ( Rosa damascena), and lavender ( Lavandula dentata, Lavandula stoechas, and Lavandula multifida) [ 87] with antinociceptive and anti-inflammatory properties [ 88], as well as antifungal ones [ 89].
